name: DiscordClient
description: Primary client to configure, connect, and interact with Discord. Manages Gateway + REST lifecycles and event dispatch.

important_methods.name: connect()
important_methods.description: Establish gateway connection, start event processing. Use `try await client.connect()` in async context.

important_methods.name: disconnect()
important_methods.description: Cleanly close gateway and background tasks.

important_methods.name: on(event, handler)
important_methods.description: Register event handlers for gateway events (ready, messageCreate, interactionCreate, etc.). Handlers receive strongly-typed models.

notes: Prefer `on` registration before `connect()`. For REST-only tasks, construct `RESTClient` directly.
